page.title: 11 CLUBS
page.content: {Clubs for adults}Many adults belong to the two big social clubs in our area. At the E57 and Yardley Wood Social Club there are Variety acts,Dances and many sports_based activities e.g. football,darts,dominoes,bowls,snooker and cards.Beer and spirits are cheaper.Some ladies belong to The Young Wives Club.They meet at the local church. {Clubs for children}Boys'Brigade ,Cubs and Scouts for the boys.Guides and Brownies are quite popular.There is a local Youth Club but it is not very popular.Some children go to specialised clubs of their interest. These include:football,swimming,disco- dancing, karate,B.M.X.,trampolining, ballet,majorettes,judo and gymnastics. {School Clubs}Schools also run clubs for children.They are sporting and intellectual e.g.chess and book clubs.
